item.title: Django Crypto App Part 3
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Ultimate Django ORM Cheatsheet + Exercises
item.description: Master the basics of Django ORM with this comprehensive cheatsheet and exercises to level up your skills in database querying, model relationships, aggregations, annotations, and more.
